question: What is the name given to thr group of nations consisting of the United States, India, Australia and Japan?
explanation:
The QUAD leaders (i.e) United States of America, India, Australia and Japan have recently agreed upon pool financing for manufacture of 1 billion coronavirus vaccines and distributing it across the Asian continent by end of 2022.
It has been proposed that Indian manufacturing capacities would be used to manufacture US vaccines with financial assistance from International Development Finance Corporation and the Japan Bank for International Cooperation.
